title: Parris Was Right: Xbox, Bethesda, and Exclusives - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.12.21
description:
Irrational Passions' Alex O'Neill joins us to dive into HELLA Xbox news, and Parris Lilly joins us to gloat about how right he was! 

Follow Alex: https://twitter.com/ALFighter27

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:50 - Housekeeping
SEND ANDREA THE SWEET NASTY LOVE:
You may have noticed I’ve been quiet here: well it’s because I’m on Day 3 of my hospital visit. My medical team is trying to figure out what is causing me excruciating abdominal pain. A coupe leads so far, but this is not how I thought this week was going to go!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson
Black Jack
Trent Berrie
Black Jack
Today, we’re brought to you by Logitech and HelloFresh but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:09:05 - Parris was Right: Xbox, Bethesda, and Exclusives
00:18:43 - “Greg, How does it feel to be so wrong about the Bethesda deal?” - The Nano Biologist
00:24:16 - 20 Bethesda Games Came to Game Pass Today
00:30:27 - Xbox Summer Event Coming
00:31:56 - “Does Bethesda studios have anything that could be ready this year?” - BJ Bernardo
00:40:08 - BUT Is there an Xbox Event Coming THIS Month?
00:43:00 -  Ad
00:46:00 - Halo Infinite Won’t Let You Dual Wield
00:52:38 - February 2021 NPDs! From the Man himself
01:00:03 - Outriders Motion Blur DIES in Next Patch
01:00:21 - No College Football until 2023
01:00:55 - Out today 
01:02:12 - You‘re Wrong
01:06:10 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and GI’s Liana Ruppert
TUE: Greg and Gary Whitta
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Bless and Parris -- this one will be after the Square Presser
FRI: Greg and Blessing







Message timecodes
